General.Name: CAZ (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: CAZ (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the construction business in Thailand. It offers engineering, procurement, construction, and construction management services; and civil engineering and structural services in the areas of foundation, infrastructure, and building works, including steel structure works, piping erection, and mechanical and equipment installation services. The company also undertakes structure erection, piping fabrication and erection, equipment erection, and electric and instrument works, including pre-commissioning and commissioning; and civil and building construction works, including engineering works. In addition, it is involved in mechanical fabrication works, including structures, vessels, heat exchangers, and tanks. The company serves industrial, energy, and petrochemical/chemical sectors. CAZ (Thailand) Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Rayong, Thailand.
